{"id":1047630551,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 weeks, 2 days","timestamp":1694536552,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"5 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1047630551/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Integer","memory":"6 MB","code":"#include <bits/stdc++.h>\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    int reverse(int x) {\n        // Convert the integer to a string\n        string num = to_string(x);\n\n        // Check if the number is negative\n        if (x < 0) {\n            // Reverse the string, excluding negative sign\n            reverseStr(num, 1, num.size()-1);\n        } else {\n            // Reverse the entire string\n            reverseStr(num, 0, num.size()-1);\n        }\n\n        long long result = stoll(num); // Convert the string back to a long long\n        if (result < INT_MIN || result > INT_MAX) {\n            return 0; // Overflow, return 0\n        }\n\n        return (int)(result);\n    }\n\n    void reverseStr(string& str, int i, int n)\n    {\n        while(i<=n){\n            swap(str[i],str[n]);\n            n = n-1;\n            i = i+1;\n        }\n    }\n\n};\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-integer","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
